column1: Flaxseeds contain fiber, vitamins, minerals, protein, healthy plant-based fats, and antioxidants that help prevent cell damage.
Flaxseeds are a good source of soluble and insoluble fiber which help keep your bowel movements regular and prevent constipation.
Next to seafood, flax oil is one of the best sources of omega-3 fatty acids, which is the hardest to get from foods.
Researchers are looking at whether consuming more of the essential fatty acids found in flaxseeds will improve blood pressure, blood sugar, heart health, and other areas.
